directions: 1. Heat olive oil in a large pan over medium heat; 2. Add onion and minced garlic and sauté until translucent; 3. Add ground beef and cook until browned; 4. Stir in tomato paste and crushed tomatoes; 5. Simmer sauce for 20 minutes; 6. Meanwhile, cook spaghetti according to package instructions; 7. Drain pasta and combine with sauce; 8. Garnish with fresh basil and serve.

1. Cut chicken into strips; 2. Heat vegetable oil in a wok over high heat; 3. Add chicken and cook until no longer pink; 4. Add garlic and ginger and stir-fry for 1 minute; 5. Add broccoli, bell pepper, and carrot and cook until crisp-tender; 6. Stir in soy sauce and sesame oil; 7. Cook for another 2 minutes; 8. Serve immediately.

1. Brown ground beef in a skillet over medium heat; 2. Stir in taco seasoning and water according to package instructions; 3. Cook until sauce thickens; 4. Warm taco shells according to package directions; 5. Assemble tacos with beef, shredded lettuce, diced tomato, diced onion, shredded cheddar, and a dollop of sour cream; 6. Serve immediately.

1. Preheat oven to 400°F; 2. Place salmon fillets on a baking sheet lined with foil; 3. In a bowl, mix olive oil, minced garlic, lemon juice, salt, and pepper; 4. Brush mixture over salmon; 5. Bake for 12-15 minutes until cooked through; 6. Garnish with chopped parsley and serve.

1. Heat vegetable oil in a large pot over medium heat; 2. Add chopped onion and minced garlic and sauté until fragrant; 3. Stir in curry powder and cook for 1 minute; 4. Add mixed vegetables, tomato paste, and coconut milk; 5. Bring to a simmer and cook for 20 minutes; 6. Garnish with fresh cilantro; 7. Serve hot.

1. Preheat oven to 375°F; 2. Pound chicken breasts to even thickness; 3. Dredge chicken in flour, dip in beaten eggs, and coat with breadcrumbs; 4. Heat olive oil in a skillet and fry chicken until golden brown; 5. Place chicken in a baking dish, top with tomato sauce and mozzarella; 6. Bake for 20 minutes until cheese is melted; 7. Sprinkle with parmesan and serve.

1. In a large skillet, melt butter with olive oil over medium heat; 2. Add minced garlic and red pepper flakes and cook for 1 minute; 3. Add shrimp and cook until pink; 4. Stir in white wine and lemon juice and simmer for 2 minutes; 5. Sprinkle with parsley and serve.

1. Cook egg noodles according to package instructions and set aside; 2. In a skillet, melt butter over medium heat; 3. Add sliced mushrooms, onion, and garlic and cook until softened; 4. Add beef strips and cook until browned; 5. Stir in flour to coat; 6. Add beef broth and simmer until sauce thickens; 7. Remove from heat and stir in sour cream; 8. Serve over noodles.

1. Preheat oven to 375°F; 2. Cook rice according to package instructions; 3. Cut tops off bell peppers and remove seeds; 4. In a skillet, heat olive oil and sauté chopped onion and garlic until translucent; 5. Add ground beef and cook until browned; 6. Stir in cooked rice and tomato sauce; 7. Fill peppers with mixture and place in a baking dish; 8. Top with cheddar cheese; 9. Bake for 30 minutes; 10. Serve hot.

1. Add ground beef, onion, garlic, chili powder, cumin, diced tomatoes, kidney beans, and beef broth to slow cooker; 2. Stir to combine; 3. Cook on low for 8 hours or high for 4 hours; 4. Serve warm.
